website_summaries.verdict: A long-lasting lipstick that keeps your lips well hydrated.
pros: Infused with shea butter, aloe, and vitamin E to keep your lips soft and hydrated
Color lasts for hours without smudging or needing a touch up
Available in a range of wearable everyday shades
cons: Colors are lighter than they appear in photos

customer_reviews.title: Nice shade and good value
customer_reviews.text: This is the Iconic. It is a neutral/blush color. It's hard to get lipstick right online so I ordered a few. It goes on creamy and dries in about 5 minutes. I did not find it sticky. It lasts through eating and drinking, but I don't think any lipstick lasts all day. It's a good value for the money and closely matches Macs 'Twig' shade.
customer_reviews.author: Lori7

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color, Great Staying Power
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best red lipsticks I've ever found. The color is just on the blue side of pure red, which works perfectly for my pink toned skin. Not only that, but it has great staying power. It survived me eating and drinking at my church picnic, doesn't kiss off, and goes on like a normal stick rather than like a liquid. If I could give it 6 stars, I would!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect natural color.  Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Have had trouble finding a flattering color now that I am older. Have read to try to match the inside of the lip. This does it perfectly. Looks natural, but not too pale. Perfect. It doesn't last all day like the 12-hour stuff, but then it isn't drying like they are either. You can gloss it up with an overlay or leave it matte.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't I the same plastic package like the other 4 and it's smudged
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately all 5 colors I ordered are too light. they look dark but they don't cover very well. You would think the 'backstage ' and 'couture' would cover well since they look so dark. But you almost can't see them. I've bought 'boho chique' at Wal-Mart. That covers very well. Could it be possible the once sold here aren't real Revlon lipsticks? I really have my doubts Another thing is that one of them looked used. See picture. It wasn't I the same plastic package like the other 4 and it's smudged.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome long-wear product!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this product. First of all it comes sealed in a plastic pouch and then sealed with a sticker so you know it is new. I love the ColorStay products because the color lasts for hours. They are inexpensive, long-wear and high quality products. No mlm needed here. I will be ordering in multiple colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lighter then expected, but gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I love the Revlon colorstay lipstick line. Red has been my go to, however I wanted to go a tad more neutral. While I love this color it is very close to my original lip color. Definitely more neutral than I intended, but it's still lovely. I have fairly fair skin, so this may look better on someone with darker skin tones. This lipstick lasts!! I hope they never stop producing it, seriously my fave lipstick for years
customer_reviews.author: Tawny maxam

customer_reviews.title: THE ONLY LIPSTICK I NEED (but in an array of colors!)
customer_reviews.text: Revlon has a winner here. 4 stars only because it's light for me, but I mix it with a darker shade. No liquid or topcoat to mess with, and it stays on until I have to use remover to remove the remainder at the end of the day. Nice suede feel and look, and I have it now in at least 8 colors (all the ones that look good with my skin tone and limited clothing colors). May Revlon keep making this forever (upgrading the formula for even stronger "staying power" is okay, but the look and feel and ease of use must remain) !!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Adams

customer_reviews.title: The only lipstick I ever wear!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to lipstick! Paired with a lip liner the staying power is amazing! I’ve been wearing the Ultimate Suede line from Revlon for years! I have four shades that suit me. I apply in the morning before work, have breakfast, lunch and snacks all without having to retouch. The only foods that causes “bleeding” are oily foods. Outside of that I’m good to go for the day. In fact I use makeup remover to take it off because even soap and water won’t remove it entirely! The only con I have is that the lipstick can be a bit drying to my lips. But I love this line from Revlon so much I hope it’s never discontinued!
customer_reviews.author: C. De Silva

customer_reviews.title: Neutral shade, would go with any skin tone!!
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall. Nice neutral shade. Would go with any skin tone. Moisturizing effect is just fine. Case is cute too. It has click rotator and makes a click for every rotation you too. Nice little innovative idea.
customer_reviews.author: Atul Singh

customer_reviews.title: Product is good, even great, but the case is bad.
customer_reviews.text: The tube that contains this lipstick falls apart. The bottom of the tube will not stay on then it's almost impossible to replace the cap without pushing it down too far & cracking the top of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in Sitka

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Besides being lighter than I wanted, I still love this lipstick. Most of the colorstay lipsticks that I have used are on the dryer side (however, I still love them and use them because of their staying power.) This particular lipstick was softer and smoother than the other ones I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Artistic Soul

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for your lady!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend and she loves it! It’s a great shade of pink berry on her and it lasts pretty much all day for her without having to constantly reapply it. It doesn’t smudge or wear when we go to eat or drink which she always had problems with other lipsticks. It’s a good quality lipstick and affordable for those not looking to spend an arm and a leg on beauty products. It’s a new favorite for her and I love the way it looks on her. Very pleased and happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin langham

customer_reviews.title: Lasts through the day with meals.
customer_reviews.text: I like this color on me. The lipstick is long lasting and remains all day even after eating numerous meals. I find that it only comes off minutes after applying it if I drink or eat something - in that case I might find some pink residue on my cup or food. But if I let it settle for a few minutes and it dries then it remains all day. PS. one downside is that it dries out my lips and I must take it off every night with makeup remover wipes and then moisturize my lips thoroughly
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Ingenue was not even close to the picture shown. Its bright purple on me. I wanted a subtle nude type color as shown. What a waste of money. I look like a hooker when I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: T. DuBose

customer_reviews.title: Finale
customer_reviews.text: Great shade! If I don’t take it off, it’ll last on my lips for 24 hours. It’s not drying. I don’t even feel like I have it on.
customer_reviews.author: April Burke

customer_reviews.title: It is so dry, has no moisture.
customer_reviews.text: It is the worst lipstick i've ever had, makes my lips stick together, can't rub your lips together, it has no moisture at all. I do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bjh

customer_reviews.title: INGENUE is very red, NOT as depicted
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for an earthy mauve I like since mine was discontinued. Liked the feature on here to see how they look on different people. I am blonde, gray eyes, very light features and LOVED Ingenue on the color swatch as well as the blonde model. But when I got it - looks absolutely nothing like that in real life. Is actually very red. Not at all as depicted online. Feels nice and is definitely moisturizing. Stayed on kind of like a stain (too bad I was trying to get it off). If it was the color I wanted I would be GLOWING with the feel and wear.
customer_reviews.author: D-Ack

customer_reviews.title: True to color.
customer_reviews.text: Has all the qualities of a lipstick that I look for. The color is true, it's moisturizing, and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Natural
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this lipstick, it looks somewhat natural and feels very soft. The lipstick easily glides on the lips and is smooth. However, it is definitely not long lasting. My job requires me to talk all day and I have to frequently re-apply this as it just comes off. Easy to re-apply, but important to note that you will need to re-apply often throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: This not COLORSTAY nor a matte finish. As a matter of fact, i dont even think its from REVLON. Its sheer and hardly any pigment at all. I wanted to return it and they said they cant refund if it was used. All i did was test in my hand (hence the reason why i know its not COLORSTAY nor a matte finish
customer_reviews.author: cynthia meza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you wear a mask... Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They are the only lipsticks I use now, especially when I have to wear a mask. If you apply a nice layer and then blot with your finger it will stay on all day. Just make sure you let it dry for about 20-30 minutes. It’s not tacky or uncomfortable. Also does not have any taste. It doubles as a blush. When you blot with your finger rub it on your cheeks for a nice glow that also lasts! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. This puts down ad darker but totally natural look. It is a matte color. It just looks like color to your lips, but natural. My new favorite.. The color stays for hours without having to put more on. I refresh in the afternoon. This is basically a tint more than a lipstick. I like it though. It puts color to my lips that stays but neutral and not over done. Great for everyday. If I want it 'dressier' I add gloss from another lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Weigel

customer_reviews.title: Looks Terrible on my Lips
customer_reviews.text: After I applied my lips looked dry and flakey. It felt creamy going on put it doesn’t melt into the lips to look smooth and pretty. Also, The color was not what I expected. It has an orange/peach tint instead of the pink/brown tone I was expecting and did not last one hour on my lips. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a waste
customer_reviews.text: Nothing ColorStay about this. It doesn't last any longer than what I can get at dollar general for a dollar. Plus the color was not as red as I thought I was getting making it too dark for my skin tone. Doesn't last more than a few hours anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera

customer_reviews.title: ... lips and you need to apply gloss or something like Blistex to keep your lips moist (bad word I ...
customer_reviews.text: It dries out your lips and you need to apply gloss or something like Blistex to keep your lips moist (bad word I know, but I had to).
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Color “Backstage” is not dark!
customer_reviews.text: The color name is Backstage. Not dark at all and is more like a lipgloss than an opaque lipstick. I wasted my money trusting the pictures. Unless you’ve purchased the lipstick before, do not buy blind. Lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: i like it, but the colors are inaccurate..
customer_reviews.text: This is ok, but the color was lighter than pictured. It’s best if you let it set for a few minutes. Doing this helps the color last. I didn’t find it particularly moisturizing, but it’s decent. I also bought the Boho Chic color. Orangey and also auitea bit licphhter and harsher than the color swatch on this page. I think this is a trial and error thing. As the colors are definitely not accurately portrayed. It’s not just Amazon, I went to other sites and based my choices on a compilation of impressions. Apparently, they weren’t that helpful. You can’t return this lipstick on Amazon. You can return cosmetics at some drug stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE this lipstick!!!
customer_reviews.text: When asked to rate features of this lipstick, one of the questions is about whether it is Moisturizing. The answer is No...not really! Tho that would be a nice quality for any lipstick, in order for it to be a lipstick that is more permanent, moisturizing is not going to be one of its attributes. I'm very o.k. with that. It is on the dry side, but still very comfortable on my lips and does not cake up. I absolutely love this lipstick! I can go almost all day without re-applying it. It is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Weimer

customer_reviews.title: I had to return cause of color.
customer_reviews.text: Color was nothing like it showed on the picture. It’s was like a Barbie pink as opposed to more of a mauve. If you have the slightest of chapped lips it clings to the skin and makes it look gross. It does last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Finally a color stay that does what's it told.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh ladies and gents!!!. This lip color truly is "color stay". In fact, I had to wash it off pretty hard with soap for it to come off. I put it on in the AM, ran, ate 4 meals, drank beverages all day , snacked and slept in it. I woke up and it was still on and it wasn't on anything. It literally stays on and does not smudge. I'm going to definitely be purchasing other colors by Revlon color stay. I'm sold! Now if only I can get the liner. Only caviot is this brand is pretty pricey if it's not on sale, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincentsara

customer_reviews.title: Can’t really recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan so good thing I got it for under $4. The color was much lighter on my lips than it appears on my monitor of even in the tube itself. It was just blah. Also went on pretty dry . I’m sure that it has a bit of staying power but with little color...so what? I’ll spend a few bucks more next time and hope for a different outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Unbiased Independent Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Lasting color
customer_reviews.text: I love how long these lipsticks last and how they don't transfer to my teeth like some other long lasting lipsticks do. They are a bit drying but I think it is worth the tradeoff for having color almost all day. I wish they would have more colors to choose from as this (Backstage) is the darkest one and it is not even that dark. It is almost more like a deep red. I have 4 or 5 shades of this lipstick though and will continue buying it as long as they make it.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Love color 'Finale'
customer_reviews.text: The color I got 'Finale' goes with everything. The color really does stay on once it dries, and the next day I even have trouble getting it off. It feels a bit dry and caked on by the end of the night, but it doesn't actually show as much as it feels. I sometimes put Chapstick over it to keep it moist. Bought several other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: IT'S HOT PINK NOT A WINE COLOR
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect if your a clown!!! Its not wine at all. Its a hot pink odd color
customer_reviews.author: HUBERT SUBER

customer_reviews.title: Like a Petroleum-based tinted lip balm
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it’s so moisturizing. Glides only like a petroleum based lip gloss with no feathering. However, color is very sheer and not buildable. If you want a very natural look, this is perfect for day use. I wouldn’t recommend it for night on its own as it wouldn’t be seen. However, I imagine it would be perfect over your favorite lipstick for added moisturize, tint and smoother outcome. Note: shape of tube and stay-on clear cap are a great design!
customer_reviews.author: popcornfrenzy

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE STAYING POWER!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Runway and Supermodel and love both shades. However, what really impresses me is the staying power of this lipstick! I apply three really light coats and let it dry for a few seconds before applying a clear semi-gloss on top for moisture. The color lasts me practically all day and only needs to be touched up with one thin coat after eating. Also, I work in surgery and this is the only lip color or gloss that I have found that won't smear or rub off due to my face mask!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: I will not repurchase this product. The color was awesome, BUT, nothing else about this product was. The pigment in this did not disperse evenly and the product was very dry and made my lips dry, as well. Not a winner in my book. I really wanted this to be a great purchase. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Caid

customer_reviews.title: Good color but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The color looks like a great neutral. However, the product arrived damaged, with some of it broken off in the lid. There’s not a replacement option, and I got a really good deal, so I’m going to keep it and use what is left. But we warned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful color, not too bright not too dull, just perfect. It can almost be used as a tinted lipgloss, but it imparts the color in one swipe and more swipes won't make it darker. The drawback is actually on the same lines, its more of a lipgloss with lesser moisturizer. Also it doesn't last, the moisture will rubs off, leaving a pinkish hue. In a nutshell, its good for a quick swipe and touch up for no makeup but pretty lips.
customer_reviews.author: MomMe

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and forgiving! Best lipstick I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.text: The BEST lipstick I have ever used. I’ve been buying this lipstick in the Couture color for 7 years and I don’t plan on quitting anytime soon. It’s very long lasting and you’re able to build up the color easily. Couture is the perfect pinky-red. It goes on easily and smoothly, and dries pretty quickly but not so quickly that you don’t have time to fix any mistakes. It’s the perfect lipstick! Buy some!
customer_reviews.author: Rhyan

customer_reviews.title: Color might be a surprise
customer_reviews.text: Unlike earlier versions of long-lasting lipsticks, this one does not leave your lips so dry that they feel like they are chapped. This one feels very smooth. But beware of the colors. I ordered "Wardrobe," a name that doesn't signify any known color. On screen, it appears to be a dark, almost purple color. Surprise! It's a reddish color. A nice color, actually, but nothing like the photo. This is the second time I ordered a shade that turned out to be much lighter/different than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: hm2450

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty color
customer_reviews.text: This is a really, really pretty color. I actually misplaced it somewhere in my friend’s house, and I ordered another one cause it’s so nice. And I rarely wear lipstick. Also, you Should REALLY BUY THIS BRAND ON AMAZON, instead of at a regular pharmacy because they’re just crazy-expensive there. I usually go to the store, find what colors I like best, and then go home and order them ☺️
customer_reviews.author: BBRITT

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. it is basically like a sheer lip balm. it is definitely not as dark as advertised. it does have some stay power which is cool, but is not moisturizing and dried the lips out after a few uses. I do not recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and stays put
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, lasts all day. I did not have to reaply. I exfoliate my lips first then put my Revlon Ultimate Suede Lipstick in color Muse. This color really is a beautiful. This lipstick is my holy grail, it is nothing like the old stay lipsticks that were so dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Lip Liner Required For A Nice Clean Edge
customer_reviews.text: Ingenue is a bit darker than I thought it would be but it is a nice shade. Revlon ColorStay definitely stays on. I can wear it all day, eat and drink and dab my mouth til bedtime. If I’m not in the mood to remove what little makeup I wear it will still be there in the morning though not quite as dark as when I put it on the previous morning. I have never spent a lot of money on one lipstick (like I have on my granddaughter for her Christmas stocking but I will go with Revlon at 1/4th the cost as her preferred lipstick. I bet she’s never tried Revlon ColorStay.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Murray

customer_reviews.title: Love this long lasting lipstick. Especially for dressing up. I purchased a dark and a light shade.
customer_reviews.text: Harley's lady and wife writing this. The darker color can be a liner. Because it stays on through the next day. But the lighter color doesn't seem to stay as long . So I use the darker as a liner. It works for me and I fill in with the lighter color. If it was more moisturizing it probably wouldn't stay on as long. That's why I gave it a 4. Its a little on the dry side. Not a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Go Harley Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: on sheer side but nice natural coverage
customer_reviews.text: on sheer side but nice natural coverage and its not sticky on your lips. wears off easily though
customer_reviews.author: deanne oldham-mcnabb

customer_reviews.title: It didn't dry my lips out as bad as other things I tried did
customer_reviews.text: I wore this on my wedding day and the next morning it was still on! It didn't dry my lips out as bad as other things I tried did! The color was really pretty as well! The price is awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: cassandra robertson

customer_reviews.title: Okay in book!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement to one I bought at CVS. I use this everyday and it’s not super pigmented for me at all. But if you like a nice tint this shade it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jesher Ciriaco

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have fair to medium skin tone. I’ve been trying different company’s lipsticks to find one I like. This goes on smoothly, is matte but not drying, and the color is very flattering. It gives color to lips but is not overpowering. I put it in then dab with facial finishing powder and it stays put for a long time. This is now my go-to lipstick and I’ll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Why do I even...

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are the longest lasting lipsticks that I’ve tried. They don’t last all day of course but they last longer than all the others I’ve tried, including lip stains. Still had it on after a meal and it doesn’t come off on my glass of water. Wish they were a bit more moisturizing. They dry in a matte finish so need some gloss over it. Use the Revlon lip exfoliator stick first and it’ll last even longer
customer_reviews.author: Carla B

customer_reviews.title: Horrible lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how anyone gave this a good rating. Maybe mines was old... the actual color was fine, but everything else was off with this lipstick. It caked up and separated. It felt weird, and was just overall messy. It even got on my teeth, and I never have that problem! Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Aliflo

customer_reviews.title: Color not the same, drying.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very dissatisfied with this lipstick. Not into is it drying, but the color I ordered looks nothing like the picture. I ordered “Runway” which appears as a reddish berry color, and it’s actually a metallic brown. It’s horrible. Now I’m stuck with it because my prime membership ended and I can’t exchange without paying for 9 dollars shipping for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick is good and stays on for a significant length of time. In fact, I have just ordered another one. However, when my lipstick arrived the casing was cracked. This “little” lipstick was shipped unsecured inside a 9x12(?) envelope which allowed the lipstick to move all around, causing the cracking of the casing during the shipping process. I hope my next one comes packaged more securely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, not long lasting at all.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed over how long the lipstick lasts. Not more than a hour if even that. I love the color and it was flattering with my skin tone. But don’t plan on drinking or eating anything if you want it to last at least an hour at most. I found a longer lasting lip stick that looks quite natural by glossier.
customer_reviews.author: Anchoragebrat

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time fav lipstick. I’m amazed at how long it stays on. Stays on through meals and it even stayed on through dinner a night out at the bar and I woke up and it was still on. LOVE the matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Nice lipstick, be cautious of the color though
customer_reviews.text: I like how well it stays on and how smoothly it applies, but be cautious about the color - I got ingenue and the "swipe" picture was much different than what actually arrived in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: rf

customer_reviews.title: Dries into cracks
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this was weird. Matte is cool and long-lasting is great, but this lipstick dries into cracks. It seriously dries like old caulk! Your lips are not left matte and beautiful; you end up looking like you just had some weird fruit that stained your lips while you were removing drywall. No thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: EKML

customer_reviews.title: What?????
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lipstick thinking i was getting Revlon and when i opened the box it had revlon on the box and the tube said Alma. It was bad lipstick
customer_reviews.author: Denise Burris

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, even coverage, a blush color, looks nice, and isnt too sticky. It does not last very long, and layering it makes it look chunky so if you reapply, I would wipe off any leftover before adding morr. Overall I like it. The color is a light blush pink. It is not barbie pink, but it is a little light.
customer_reviews.author: Allain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Currently only wearing this on video calls, but it makes me feel pretty and a little more put together. The textures is soft and not waxy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia N.

customer_reviews.title: Revlon color stay really stays on!
customer_reviews.text: This product stays on so good that u have to use makeup remover to tale it off once it dries in about 5 minutes. It also does not leave a lipstick mark on your cup or from anything you are drinking from. The small minor detail is that it has no moisture and is a bit drying. Purchase this product if you do not mind the non glossy look.
customer_reviews.author: Sherie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the color stay back in the day, now this is the best of the best
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Revlon color stay for 30 years now but when I tried this I felt like you guys have gone up many steps since then. The color did not feel dry on my lips like Revlon color stay did back in the day. It felt like they were moist and it felt like they were hydrated. And I loved the color!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Haigler Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Very resistant
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful and it does stay even after lunch.. it was wet at first but when it dries it very resistant.. oh and it does not crack right away.. maybe after hours of wearing and eating and drinking
customer_reviews.author: Lizprinz

customer_reviews.title: Natural color...love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. Below is her quoted review on this product: “I am fully satisfied with this product.This Revlon colorStay lipstick gives me a soft and natural look which I can wear with all of my dress.The most important feature is the color stay for long time . It’s true that it does not give you a glossy look but you can gloss it with lipgloss or leave it matte. so , why waiting just go for it and bring it as a new tool in your makeup kit. “
customer_reviews.author: Pradipta

customer_reviews.title: Feels light
customer_reviews.text: This brand of lipstick is very light, with subtle color. It's moisturizing too, which I need. If you want something subtle that feels great, try it. The only drawback is that it doesn't last all that long.
customer_reviews.author: V. Lord

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soft pink color. If you can get two applications on about 15-30 minutes apart, the color stays, much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Faberge

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the color I thought, so that's my fault. It flakes and its extra dry. Not my color. Its very light pink.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Rowsell

customer_reviews.title: COLORS ARE A LITTLE LIGHTER THAN SHADES SHOWN
customer_reviews.text: COLORS ARE LIGHTER THAN EXPECTED...SO GO A SHADE OR TWO DARKER. STICKY WHEN FIRST APPLIED, THEN IT DRIES LIGHTWEIGHT. NOT AS HEAVY ON YOUR LIPS AS SOME MATTE. OVERALL, I LIKE THIS LIPSTICK. I'LL JUST ORDER A DARKER SHADE OR SHADES NEXT TIME.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Hint-o-color
customer_reviews.text: I like the color I got, which is always a bit of a gamble. The thing I do not like about it is the lack of pigment. I think it goes on like a matte balm. The color is very subtle. I got a neutral pink shade. I can’t remember the name right now.
customer_reviews.author: Sym

customer_reviews.title: Great formula.. Wish shade was a bit darker
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick formula and I chose the shade Iconic which is actually very pretty. A bit Peachy with flecks of gold. The only thing I would change is that the shade is a bit lighter than I expected. But the lipstick goes on evenly and smoothly had good staying power without bleeding and feels very moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: Malinda SynnamonTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: NO color pay-off
customer_reviews.text: There is NO color pay-off of this lipstick. I put it on my lips & the color was just not there. Didn't saturate me in color, which was a pink. Will never buy again. I WILL still buy certain lipsticks from Revlon since they're great, the satin finish ones.
customer_reviews.author: Carleenie

customer_reviews.title: great gloss
customer_reviews.text: love this, its a great color, subtle, not over the top and it keeps my lips soft. I am not good at remembering to put lipstick on every day but this makes it easy and is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: You get long wear
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for years and swear behind it . It does stay on for hours and looks flawless for hours . Doesn’t dry your lips out . Love the choices of colors and have tried several different colors . You won’t be disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Donohue

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This lip color stay is the BEST. I’ve worn this for years. I was excited to find it on Amazon! The shade I bought is perfect. It looks more to your true natural color of your lips. You won’t be disappointed! Fast shipping and fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price, beautiful color.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and price, Beautiful color. It is dry, but the ingredients nourishes the lips so the do not crack and do not need moist (vaseline, chapstick.....) or anything on to of it. Stay perfect the whole day/night. You may need to reapply only after eating and just in the innner part of the lips. I have 8 colors and love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Muted color, pretty good wear
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product. The color is muted and gives a natural color to the lips without a heavy makeup appearance making it good for everyday wear. It has good staying power, however, it does require occasional reapplication during the day for a fresh appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Dry, cakey
customer_reviews.text: This product really dries out my lips and doesn't look very nice after an hour or so. It feels pretty cakey to me. This particular color appeared to be more of a red but it's really a pretty unflattering pink. Not a great purchase for me. :-)
customer_reviews.author: mal

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dry out already dry lips.
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry lips due to an auto immune disease. I haven't been able to wear a long lasting lipstick. This lipstick does not dry and last.
customer_reviews.author: CJackson

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I use this lipstick exclusively because it doesn't feel cakey or sticky and it stays on quite a long time. The color is beautiful. I thought it would be darker but it just matches my natural lip tone with a hint of tint. It's very flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs P & J

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful and bold. I'm a fan of this long wear lipstick. I never have time to reapply and this is perfect. Just put it on in the morning and its good for hours. It does eventually get dry, but add chap stick over it and it's good to go! Will definitely buy more shades
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: When you first apply this lipstick it takes just a few minutes to dry. My experience is that the color will stay for about half a day which includes sipping on a beverage. After that, the color disappears.
customer_reviews.author: Sef Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays put all day! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim. I am very pleased that I did! The color is pretty and it really stays on even after eating, drinking, and kissing! It doesn't smear. It is very flattering! Price is good too!
customer_reviews.author: Ang Rags

customer_reviews.title: Will have to go to a physical store to get what I want...
customer_reviews.text: I used the virtual tool to see what it would look like on me, I wanted a beige color and that’s what It looked like it would be, but this color was orange on my lips when I got it so I gave it to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: It stays on even after eating!
customer_reviews.text: I liked all of the above the colors are flattering and it stays on the longest of any lipstick that I have ever worn The only thing was that I was sent to what these lipsticks and I only ordered one
customer_reviews.author: Judy Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Buying more colors soon!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best lip colors I have used. I don’t usually wear lip stick because it always gets messy and the texture is never right for me, but this Revlon met all of my requirements. I will be ordering more colors soon! Shipping was pretty quick & simple also!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lips!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Lasts all day, but doesn't dry out the lips like some other long lasting brands. It's also a very nice color - not too bright/bold, but just enough to add a little something.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Brady

customer_reviews.title: The best for everyday wear. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick is so smooth and light weight. It stays on for hours. The color is neutral. Not too light and not too dark. My skin is light to medium normally but gets golden tan in summer.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and miserable
customer_reviews.text: The sticky feel alone of the lipstick did it in for me. Nothing worse than feeling like you have glue on your lips all day. Color wasn't flattering either - huge strike here.
customer_reviews.author: brookerie

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable -- Dries Sticky
customer_reviews.text: The color is great, but it dries sticky. When applied it feels nice, but after about 5 mins it's really tacky, which is uncomfortable. Putting some Vaseline on top seems to help, but that's a hassle. Won't get again.
customer_reviews.author: C. ALLINGER

customer_reviews.title: Stays On All Day, Even After Eating
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite lip color for years. Getting hard to find in stores but I did find it on Amazon. Will continue to use it as long as I can find it. Real staying power!
customer_reviews.author: Jane R

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color
customer_reviews.text: It looks nothing like the color I thought it would in person. It's a pretty color but not what I expected and I even done the try before you buy thing where you upload your picture to see how it will look in you. Not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: jessica guevara

customer_reviews.title: the color is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this lipstick for years now....it stays on a long time, the color is perfect for me, and it FEELS good on--unlike the other kind where you paint it on, let it dry, and then add "moisture." This is the best!
customer_reviews.author: DP ~ The Uncontrollable Spender!

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Stay on Long
customer_reviews.text: The color was good however it doesn’t stay on well at all. You have to reapply about every hour to keep the look. I like the product if it stayed on longer it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Richardson

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: good coverage and it stays on all day. The color was way too bright for my taste, maybe trying a different color would change my opinion, I will let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Bach

customer_reviews.title: great color / not dark, almost like a matte gloss
customer_reviews.text: great color / not dark, almost like a matte gloss if that makes any sense. It goes on nice an smooth and lasts a good amount of time -- after eating and stuff. works great with my olive complexion
customer_reviews.author: itsallinurmind

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with Supermodel
customer_reviews.text: The shade Supermodel is the lipstick I’ve been searching for all my life! It looks natural and sooo flattering. I’m obsessed. The only con is that it is a little drying (but it goes on perfectly smoothly.) I always follow it with chapstick.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beth

customer_reviews.title: Color doesn't look like the color on the outside tubelor on the tube
customer_reviews.text: The color on the tube was a different color than the lipstick. It wasn't like a pigmented lipstick more like a lightly colorly lipgloss. If you want a lipgloss look you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Peppermint tea

customer_reviews.title: Long wearing lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I like this lipstick. The color is nice and it stays on for quite a while. It does feel a little dry once it's been on for just a short period of time. I generally add some lip gloss over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Vann

customer_reviews.title: My go-to from now on!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 76, and this will be my go-to lipstick! It’s matte, non drying (if you exfoliate before using) and long lasting. Finally a lipstick that’s light enough for daytime and stays on!
customer_reviews.author: di318

product_meta.title: Revlon ColorStay Ultimate Suede Lipstick, Iconic
product_meta.description:
Color:IconicGet all day color and a soft matte finish with the Revlon ColorStay Ultimate Suede Lipstick. This lipstick is formulated with Shea Butter, Aloe, and Vitamin E to give lips instant moisture with a velvety feel. Available in a variety of longwear shades. Revlon is a global leader in cosmetics, hair color, fragrances, skincare, and beauty care products. One of the strongest consumer brand franchises in the world, Revlon’s products are sold in over 100 countries across six continents. Revlon revitalized the industry over the years with iconic nail and lip colors and with breakthrough technology like ColorStay transfer-resistant lipstick and makeup.

BRAND STORY
By Revlon
feature_bullets: Formulated with shea butter, aloe, and vitamin E
Provides all day color with a soft matte finish
Available in a variety of shades

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
